name: Opticon
description:
You awaken on a strange world inhabited by mysterious lifeforms. They can't seem to keep their eyes off of you.

Opticon is a procedural game where you search for treasures and forage for mushrooms in a randomly-generated infinite world, while avoiding the wrath of giant floating space eyeballs. It was developed in a month as an entry for Github Game Off 2018.

Default Controls:

  • WASD - Move
  • Space - Jump
  • Click - Interact
